articles.title: American teacher stuck in Singapore due to COVID-19 pandemic forged insurance letter to have surgery - CNA
articles.description: The 43-year-old man cheated Mount Alvernia Hospital into performing a S$20,000 surgical procedure by forging a letter of guarantee from an insurance company.
articles.content: SINGAPORE: An American teacher who was unable to travel home for regular medical treatment due to the COVID-19 pandemic forged an insurance letter and deceived a hospital into performing a surgical p… [+3858 chars]

articles.title: Megadrought: How the current Southwestern North American megadrought is affecting Earth's upper atmosphere - EurekAlert
articles.description: New research, based on two decades’ worth of data, shows that in the ten years after its onset in 2000, the Southwestern North American (SWNA) megadrought caused a 30% change in gravity wave activity in Earth’s upper atmosphere.
articles.content:
